title: Attari-Wagah Border flag ceremony | Incredible India
description:

The drill is characterized by elaborate and rapid dance-like maneuvers and raising legs as high as possible, a sight which is truly worth witnessing. This place is Just at a half an hour drive from Amritsar, Punjab.

description:
